title: Central Waikiki Oasis with Daily Breakfast, Nightly Cocktails & Saltwater Swimming Pool
description:
Experience the perfect fusion of mid-century modern design and iconic Hawaiian charm at this stunning hotel, ideally located amid Waikiki’s vibrant nightlife and bustling shopping precinct, just a short walk from the iconic sands of Waikiki Beach. 

As part of Marriott's Autograph Collection, this urban oasis exceeds expectations with a serene saltwater pool surrounded by lush greenery, complemented by an open-air lanai featuring cozy fire pits that overlook the lively streets of Waikiki.

Indulge in a modern twist on Hawaiian cuisine at Hideout, where fusion-inspired dishes and signature cocktails are served in a tranquil, open-air setting with nightly live entertainment.

Visit the Duke statue, take a surfing lesson, stroll through streets lined with upscale boutiques and vibrant dining venues or explore O’ahu’s diverse attractions. Within a short drive, you’ll find Pearl Harbor, Diamond Head State Monument and world-class shopping at Ala Moana Shopping Mall.
offer_address: 2299 Kuhio Avenue, Honolulu, Hawaii 96815, United States

vendor_name: Moana Surfrider, A Westin Resort & Spa, Waikiki Beach
title: Hawaii Iconic Moana Surfrider Beachfront Haven with Daily Breakfast & US$100 Dine-Around Credit
description:
Experience a not-to-be-missed stay at Moana Surfrider, A Westin Resort & Spa, Waikiki Beach - an iconic Oahu oasis boasting an unrivalled location on Waikiki's beachfront. With roundtrip flights included, this is everything you want from a Hawaiian holiday, bundled up into one perfect package. The historic hotel famously opened in 1901 and is widely known as the ‘First Lady of Waikiki', offering the warmth of both island hospitality and the tropical ocean breeze. Satisfy your craving for delectable dishes with a dine-around credit to use at six onsite restaurants and select outlets across three further resorts.

Weave your way through the coast-hugging resort to discover a shimmering outdoor pool, the only beachfront spa in Waikiki and a state-of-the-art fitness centre. There's no such thing as boredom in Hawaii, with a host of cultural activities available during your stay, including ukelele lessons, standup paddleboarding and lei making. Be sure to visit the nearby Diamond Head and Pearl Harbor Memorial, step straight out onto sugar-fine sands with direct beach access or explore Honolulu's vibrant shopping, dining and entertainment attractions, all just moments away.
location_description: Moana Surfrider, A Westin Resort & Spa, Waikiki Beach
offer_address: 2365 Kalakaua Avenue, Honolulu, Hawaii 96815, United States

For the first time on Luxury Escapes, you can experience a memorable stay at this historic hotel that famously opened in 1901 and is widely known as the ‘First Lady of Waikiki.’ Weave your way through the coast-hugging resort to discover a shimmering outdoor pool, the only beachfront spa in Waikiki, six dreamy dining venues serving everything from traditional Hawaiian to cocktails and poolside bites and a state-of-the-art fitness centre.

title: Stylish Waikiki Urban Oasis with Daily Breakfast & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Mid-century modern design and iconic Hawaii charm blend seamlessly together at The Laylow, Autograph Collection, a stunning hotel perfectly located amid Waikiki’s vibrant nightlife, pristine beaches and bustling shopping district. Part of the Marriott’s Autograph Collection hotels, this urban oasis more than lives up to expectations with a tranquil saltwater pool surrounded by lush greenery and a open-air lanai with cosy firepits overlooking Waikiki's bustling streets. Savour a modern take on Hapa-Hawaiian cuisine at Hideout, serving up fusion-inspired dishes and signature cocktails in a tranquil, open-air setting with nightly live entertainment.

The pristine shores and calm waters of the world-famous Waikiki Beach beckon the minute you venture out of your hotel. Take a surfing lesson, wander the streets lined with high-end boutiques and vibrant dining venues, or explore the variety of O'ahu attractions within driving distance - including Pearl Harbour, Diamond Head State Monument and the laidback North Shore.
offer_address: 2299 Kuhio Avenue, Honolulu, Hawaii 96815, United States

title: Award-Winning Hilton Waikiki Family Escape with Executive Lounge Access
description:
Soak up the sun in the heart of Hawaii's iconic Waikiki, where Hilton's globally-renowned service and iconic ocean views await at the award-winning Hilton Waikiki Beach. Steps from the golden shores of this stunning beach, Honolulu's vibrant shopping and entertainment district on Kalakaua Avenue and a stone's throw from Diamond Head, this is the ultimate escape for families and couples alike. Embrace the Hawaiian lifestyle with Executive Lounge access - including daily buffet breakfast, afternoon appetisers and unlimited non-alcoholic drinks - one three-course set menu dinner at M.A.C. 24/7 Restaurant and one daily beer or glass of wine per adult at any onsite bar. Plus, resort fees and taxes are included, with unlimited movies, special discounts, a savings passport, pool toys and more.

**Travelling with the family?** Two children (aged 11 years and under) stay and eat free (see Fine Print for details).

⏱**Buy now, book later:** Secure this deal now and choose your travel dates when you're ready (see Fine Print for details).
offer_address: 2500 Kūhiō Ave., Honolulu, HI 96815, United States
